title: An Act including worker-owned businesses economic development programs

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Oliveira, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 816) of Jacob R. Oliveira and Steven Owens for legislation to support businesses where employees have ownership stakes within initiatives aimed at fostering economic growth in a community.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
